Access Control.Description: Returns a list of all permissions defined in your container.
Returns a list of all permissions defined in your container.

Configurations.Operation: Web App Scanning V2 - Search scan configurations
Configurations.Description: Returns a list of web application scan configurations. If a scan has been run using the configuration, the list also contains information about the last scan that was run.

Configurations.Operation: Web App Scanning V2 - Get scan configuration details
Configurations.Description: Returns details for the specified scan configuration.

Scans.Description: Returns a list of scans where you have at least CAN VIEW [16] scan permissions.

Returns scan results for a specific scan. If you submit a request without query parameters, Tenable.io returns results from the latest run of the specified scan. If you submit a request using the query parameters to specify a historical run of the scan, Tenable.io returns the scan results for the specified run.
Returns details for the specified host.

Scans.Operation: Web App Scanning V2 - List scans
Web App Scanning V2 - Get scan details

Templates.Operation: Web App Scanning V2 - xxxList Tenable-provided templates
Templates.Description: Returns a paginated list of Tenable-provided templates that are available to be used for scan configurations.

Templates.Operation: Web App Scanning V2 - Get Tenable-provided template details
Templates.Description: Returns the details for a Tenable-provided template. Tenable-provided templates can be used to define scan configurations.

Templates.Operation: Web App Scanning V2 - Search user-defined templates
Templates.Description: Returns a paginated list of user-defined templates that are available to be used for scan configurations.

Templates.Operation: Web App Scanning V2 - Get user-defined template details
Templates.Description: Returns details for a user-defined template. User-defined templates can be used to define scan configurations.

Users.Description: Returns details for a specific user.
